txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'The Wood-trolls within the Haycliff are brutal creatures. Dark, perverted nature brought to bear among the rotting, dead wood of the forest.

'To continue to use the Haycliff for its resources, the Wood-trolls within must be culled and wrought back to the earth from whence they came.

'Head to the Haycliff and defeat the Wood-trolls you find there.'
'Until the Enemy is driven from these lands, I fear the wood of the Haycliff will continue to fight against us.'
'Are you ready to head within the Haycliff?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
The Wood-trolls within the Haycliff guard it fiercely, preventing access and travel to all.
Wood-trolls can be found at the Haycliff.\n\nDernstan has asked to venture within the Haycliff and defeat the Wood-trolls found there.
Dernstan is at Eaworth.\n\nDernstan will be pleased to hear you have defeated many Wood-trolls within the Haycliff.
